-A INPUT -d 127.0.0.1/32 -i lo -j ACCEPT

:PREROUTING ACCEPT [33:7908]
:INPUT ACCEPT [9:2671]
:POSTROUTING ACCEPT [0:0]
:OUTPUT ACCEPT [30:2069]
-A PREROUTING -i enp0s8 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 80 -j DNAT --to-destination 192.168.101.3:80

-A PREROUTING -i enp0s8 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 22 -j DNAT --to-destination 192.168.103.5:22
-A POSTROUTING -o enp0s10 -j MASQUERADE
-A POSTROUTING -o enp0s3 -j MASQUERADE
